text:
View this post on Instagram
Two stars among the light #shahrukhkhan and #gaurikhan celebrate Diwali at their residence
A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) on Nov 3, 2018 at 10:49am PDT
title: From Aamir Khan To Kareena Kapoor, Celebs Upped The Glamourous Quotient At Shah Rukh Khan’s Diwali Bash
description: Last night, Shah Rukh Khan, the Badshah of Bollywood, who celebrated his birthday recently, hosted a Diwali bash at his residence and it was all full of fun and frolic, the pictures have revealed. From Katrina Kaif and Kareena Kapoor to Aamir Khan and Akshay Kumar, a lot of celebrities graced the glamorous bash. Take a look at the pictures below.
